just another conjuration spell to summon \"Saber\'s Armor\" set
descriptionHtml:
Update:
change the weapon model to Excalibur : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3542
0. Disclaimer and Requirement:

this file only contain .esp and script, I DID NOT BUILD THE MODELS. so you need the original fizban007\'s Saber Armor for this mod to works.
    Requirement:
    fizban007 Saber\'s Armor mod: 
    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10154
    1096bimu Excalibur:
    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3542


WARNING THIS MOD MAY CONTAINS SOMETHING NOT LORE FRIENDLY!! so spare me from any FLAMING and TROLLING, i only accept CONSTRUCTIVE criticsms.

-this is my first mod, so i\'m apologize if you find any bug, or is not working as the way it should

1. what does this mod do?
this mod add a spell tome to conjure Armor (Saber\'s Armor) and weapon (Excalibur)
the power of the armor is increasing at certain point of conjuration skill, here is the details:
    a.  Saber Magical Cuirass
    Conjuration 0-25 -> Fortify Health
    Conjuration 25 -> Fortify more Health + Fortify Armor Rating
    Conjuration 50 -> Fortify more Health + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 75 -> Fortify more Health + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 90 -> add auto frost cloak 15 damage/sec while enter \"combat\" mode

    b.  Saber Magical Gauntlets
    Conjuration 0-25 -> Fortify 2-handed damage
    Conjuration 25 -> more 2-handed damage + Fortify Armor Rating
    Conjuration 50 -> more 2-handed damage + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 75 -> more 2-handed damage + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 90 -> Spellbreaker effect while guarding

    c.  Excalibur
    Conjuration 0-25 -> Frost Damage
    Conjuration 25 -> More Frost Damage
    Conjuration 50 -> More Frost Damage + Absorb Health*
    Conjuration 75 -> More Frost Damage + Absorb Magicka*
    Conjuration 90 -> Chance to paralyze enemy for 2 sec

    d.  Saber Magical Boots
    Conjuration 0-25 -> Fortify Stamina
    Conjuration 25 -> Fortify more Stamina + Fortify Armor Rating
    Conjuration 50 -> Fortify more Stamina + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 75 -> Fortify more Staimina + Fortify more Armor Rating
    Conjuration 90 -> add invisibility effect while enter Sneaking

2. where i can find the tome?
the tome can be created at the smithing forge under \"misc\" category or you can always use the console command (~):
> help \"Spell Tome: Magical Suit\" 0
> player.additem <code> 1

3. Installation:
put ConjureMagicalSuit.esp and scripts folder in <skyrim folder>\\data 
when you asked merge folder, click yes
or 
use nexus mod manager (i hope its working)
don\'t forget check ConjureMagicalSuit in your mod manager

4. Uninstallation
remove:
ConjureMagicalSuit.esp
Scripts\\BoundArmorSaber.pex
Scripts\\Source\\BoundArmorSaber.psc
from your data folder

5. Known Bugs:
> Absorb Life and magicka is not working
> when effect wears out it doesn\'t automatically equip your prior equipment

6. to do no promise:
> add light armor and unarmored version
> search for available weapons and armor models that i can use
> Bug fixes 

note : 
> i\'m not an English speaker, so i apologize if there any language error
> please endorse, if you like the file ^^

Credits:
fizban007 for amazing Armors
1096bimu for amazing Excalibur model
